Html:
Hi,
How can i get points lat lng from route?
Route consists of many straight lines. So I wnat to get points of each straight lines from route.

in C# Form application
Thank you.

You can get the points like this. If you need a specifc one do an if statement for it in the loop.
    Dim pts As New List(Of PointLatLng)
    For Each rt In _gmap.Overlays(0).Routes
      pts.AddRange(rt.Points)
    Next

Hi,
Thanks for your help.
best regards.
